text: Robert John Ritson (1 August 1936 - 20 July 2013) was an Australian politician. He was a Liberal member of the South Australian Legislative Council from 1979 to 1993. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Liberal Party of Australia members of the Parliament of South Australia Category:Members of the South Australian Legislative Council Category:Place of birth missing
title: Robert Ritson
